```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
enrollment <- read_excel("raw_data/class_enrollment_summary_by_term_2-10-2021.xlsx", skip = 3)

enrollment %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  drop_na(course_name) %>%
  select(course_name, total) %>%
  group_by(course_name) %>%
  summarise(sum_total = sum(total)) %>%
  arrange(desc(sum_total)) %>%
  slice(1:10) %>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(fct_reorder(course_name, sum_total), sum_total)) +
  geom_col()
```

```{r}
enrollment %>%
  filter(`Course Name` == "Expository Writing 20")
```
